body: To determine how much progress a character makes on building a trap each week, that character makes a Craft (traps) check. See the Craft skill description for details on Craft checks and the circumstances that can affect them.
name: Making the Checks
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/Sample Traps/Designing a Trap/Craft DCs for Mechanical Traps/Making the Checks
